item.title: It’s Exactly 2 Years Until A ‘Ring Of Fire’ Eclipse In The Galapagos
item.description: On Jan. 26, 2028, a long annular solar eclipse will sweep across South America, the Galápagos Islands, the Atlantic Ocean, and southern Europe.
